name: P256.Signing
desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using the NIST P-256 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA).

items.name: struct P256.Signing.PrivateKey
items.desc: A P-256 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

items.name: struct P256.Signing.PublicKey
items.desc: A P-256 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.
